description: rounded wedge or boat-shaped bowl; small cover with applied loop handle; linear elements on body; aqua, green and tan glaze with cream interior
dimension: H.3-7/8 x W.4-3/4 x D.3-1/2 in. (overall)
life_date: American (Virginia, Willsburg, born Ohio, Cleveland), born 1948

title: Sugar Bowl, from a Sugar and Creamer Set
